job_title: Charity Shop Supervisor in Edinburgh, Scotland
pros: This organization is a place where you will be warmly welcomed by staff and volunteers. Tea breaks are frequent and fun ways to connect with colleagues and to give volunteers a break and show them appreciation. . Being from the United States I was really impressed with the paid time off and no questions asked for taking two weeks in a row off - which would be difficult in many US companies. As the company name expresses it is a Christian organization which includes prayer in daily work however does not focus on evangelism - that is not their mission. If you want to work for an organization that is giving a hope and a future to vulnerable and homeless people take a look at Bethany!
cons: communication within the organization could be improved.

pros: It is a Christian charity that helps homeless and vulnerable people. as such when you are working for them you know it is for a good cause rather than just to put food on your own plate.
